Package model.dao

Interface UserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLUserDAO
public interface UserDAO
Interface that abstracts the persistence of game from the rest of the code. In particular, it follows the Data Access Object design pattern, which is commonly used to abstract persistence implementations with a set of generic operations.
Version:
22/5/2021
Author:
Riccardo Giacalone (ricardo.giacalone@students.salle.url.edu), Guillermo Gonzalez (guillermo.g@students.salle.url.edu), Oscar Cubeles (oscar.cubeles@students.salle.url.edu), Goddy Clinton (weriwohmbang.g@students.salle.url.edu)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addUser​(User user)
    Method that saves a specific user, persisting it.
    void deleteUser​(java.lang.String username)
    Method that deletes a persisted user, by its username.
    boolean emailExists​(java.lang.String email)
    Method that returns if an email exists in the database.
    User getUser​(java.lang.String username)
    Method that reads the persisted information, returning all stored users.
    boolean isPasswordValid​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, boolean isUsername)
    Method that returns if a password exists in the database.
    boolean usernameExists​(java.lang.String username)
    Method that returns if a username exists in the database.

      boolean isPasswordValid​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, boolean isUsername)
      Method that returns if a password exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      isUsername - the is username
      Returns:
      the boolean

    • getUser

      User getUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Method that reads the persisted information, returning all stored users.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      Returns:
      the User

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Method that deletes a persisted user, by its username. It also deletes all the information about this user from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
